document.full_text: state street corp , the world's third largest institutional investor, said it was under investigation by the securities and exchange commission (sec) for its foreign exchange pricing methods for pension plans.
document.title: state street says sec probes its forex pricing
lines_and_colors: state street corp , the world's third largest institutional investor, said it was under investigation by the securities and exchange commission (sec) for its foreign exchange pricing methods for pension plans.
